name: Boring Day
content: 我醒得太早睡得不好身边没有你
结束了忙碌感觉好孤独
不管你去到哪里我跟着你旅行
每一次好久不见加深更多想念
It all sounds the same anyway
It's just another boring day today

It all sounds the same anyway
It's just another boring day today
